name: Before Regret (Alpha Version)
description:
This game is about a young man named Heri and this is his new semester at university but he feels lazy about everything when he feels asleep and leaves in his dreams, he has the duty to defeat 7 Deadly Sins in his own dreams so that he never regrets his youth . but in this game we can only make 1 boss battle and one level but this not perfect yet so I hope you can comment on this game so we can know your response about this game. Play my first game and give us feedback, thank you and have a nice day :D

Note : Press Arrow Down to next the dialogue on game :D
